package.title: system
package.description:
Core of the Kajona framework. By default, the system-packages includes several modules, e.g. system, permissions, user, messaging and languages.
When updating from 5.0 to 5.1 or performing another major update from x.x to x.y, make sure to use the upgrade script instead of the internal package management. See https://www.kajona.de/updateguide.html for details.
package.author: Kajona Team
